[Original Pointer cheats for HP/SP By LionWolf]

[Notes: By Gamerjin]
[turns out there is a flaw with Both the inf Hp and inf SP]

[inf Hp: when the brothers are a boss, the code includes them as allies, and so their health doesnt decrease like it suppose to.]

[inf sp: (Penny) the one with the robot arm, her special is linked to the energy bar, sooooo her special will not stop because the energy never goes down...]
[inf sp: (Penny) the one with the robot arm, her special is linked to the energy bar, sooooo her special with not stop because the energy never goes down....]
